titles: An ansvver to a book set forth by Sir Edward Peyton, knight and baronet carrying this title A discourse concerning the fitnesse of the posture necessary to be used in taking the bread and wine at the Sacrament / by Rodger Cocks ...
author: Cocks, Roger, fl. 1630-1642.
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Peyton, Edward, --  Sir, 1588?-1657. --  Discourse concerning the fitnesse of the posture necessary to be used in taking bread and wine at the Sacrament.
